org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.frontend.topology

Class TopologyImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.frontend.topology.TopologyImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Topology

    public class TopologyImpl
extends Object
implements Topology, Cloneable
    Class represents hosts topology handled by resource manager.

      • addHostTopology

        public void addHostTopology(String hostName,
                            InetAddress hostAddress,
                            HashMap<String,Long> hostTopology)
        Adds host information to the topology. Pass both name and address of host avoiding to do a conversion inside.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the name of the host
        hostAddress - the address of the host
        hostTopology - distances to other hosts

      • removeHostTopology

        public void removeHostTopology(String hostName)
        Removes all information about host from the topology. As it stores internally names and addresses we do not try to convert one into another (as it may lead to network call) but rather pass them as parameters.
        Parameters:
        hostName - name of host to be removed

      • getHostTopology

        public HashMap<String,Long> getHostTopology(String hostName)
        Gets the distances associated to the host. Note that it does not return information about all hosts handled by the resource manager but rather the information about hosts added before the one specified.
        Specified by:
        getHostTopology in interface Topology
        Parameters:
        hostName - - name of the host
        Returns:
        distances map to nodes added before this one

      • knownHost

        public boolean knownHost(String hostName)
        Checks if the information about host is presented in the topology records.
        Specified by:
        knownHost in interface Topology
        Parameters:
        hostName - name of the host
        Returns:
        true if the host is known, false otherwise

        Clustirizes hosts into clusters based on their proximity
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
